    • About Karen & Joe Donovan


    Donovan Home Sales, Inc., founded in 2000, is built on a strong foundation of core values and purpose. We operate in a fun, exciting and challenging environment that helps all of us achieve our goals. Each of our staff members and agents are dedicated to teamwork, self-improvement, positive attitudes and most importantly, a passion and drive to surpass the expectations of every client who does business with us. Whether you are looking to sell your home, or purchase a new one, we can offer a dedicated professional team and an innovative on-line approach.

    Our team of enthusiastic, hard working real estate agents is ready to walk you through the process of buying the perfect home or selling your existing house for the best price.

    Joe and Karen Donovan, Broker âOwners, have been helping families in the Tampa Bay - St. Pete/Clearwater area for over 20 years. Joe & Karen and their team have participated in helping over 1000 families turn their real estate dreams and goals into reality.
